    • Constructor Detail

      • Projection

        public Projection(java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                  Auditorium auditorium,
                  Movie movie)
        Three-argument constructor. Auditorium is set to a given auditorium, movie is set to a given movie and start is set to a given date.
        Parameters:
        auditorium - the cinema`s auditorium as an auditorium object
        movie - the movie as a movie object
        start - the start of a movie as a local date and time
